channel.title: Alls on my trip navigation
channel.description: Recent content in Alls on my trip navigation

item.title: Abudhabi
item.description: 🕌 Must-Visit Places in Abu Dhabi Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque – Iconic white marble mosque; visit at sunset for golden reflections. Louvre Abu Dhabi – World-class art museum on Saadiyat Island; blend of cultures and architecture. Qasr Al Watan – Presidential palace showcasing Arabic architecture and heritage. Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental – Luxury hotel worth visiting even just for coffee with gold flakes. Corniche Beach – Family-friendly waterfront promenade with parks, bike paths, and cafés.

item.title: Jakarta
item.description: 🏙️ Must Visit in Jakarta Cultural & Historical Sites Kota Tua (Old Town) – colonial architecture, museums, and street performers. National Monument (Monas) – the city’s iconic landmark with a great view from the top. Istiqlal Mosque & Jakarta Cathedral – two grand religious landmarks right across from each other. Museum Nasional (National Museum) – excellent introduction to Indonesian culture and history. Taman Mini Indonesia Indah – miniature cultural park showing all provinces of Indonesia.

item.title: Rome
item.description: 🏛️ Must-Visit Places in Rome Classic Highlights Colosseum & Roman Forum – Ancient Rome’s heart; book a combo ticket and go early. Pantheon – Nearly 2,000 years old and still jaw-dropping. Trevi Fountain – Toss a coin to ensure your return to Rome. Piazza Navona – Baroque fountains and lively street artists. Spanish Steps – Iconic photo spot and shopping area. Vatican City – Visit St. Peter’s Basilica, Vatican Museums, and the Sistine Chapel.

item.title: Lisbon
item.description: 🏙️ Must-Visit Places in Lisbon Top Highlights Belém Tower (Torre de Belém) – Iconic waterfront fortress and symbol of Portugal’s Age of Discovery. Jerónimos Monastery – Stunning Manueline architecture and Vasco da Gama’s tomb. Alfama District – Oldest neighborhood; maze of alleys, Fado music, and local taverns. São Jorge Castle (Castelo de São Jorge) – Best panoramic view over the city. Baixa & Rossio Square – Heart of downtown Lisbon, rebuilt after 1755 earthquake.

item.title: Dubai
item.description: 🇦🇪 Must-Visit Places in Dubai Iconic Landmarks: Burj Khalifa – World’s tallest tower; visit at sunset for stunning skyline views. Dubai Fountain – Watch the evening fountain shows outside Dubai Mall. Palm Jumeirah – Man-made island; visit The View at The Palm or Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark. Dubai Marina – Scenic waterfront with restaurants and yacht cruises. Jumeirah Beach / Kite Beach – Relax with Burj Al Arab in the background.

item.title: Mallorca
item.description: 🏝️ Must Visit in Mallorca Palma de Mallorca – Explore the Gothic La Seu Cathedral, Almudaina Palace, and old town streets. Valldemossa – Charming mountain village where Chopin stayed. Deià – Artistic coastal village with stunning views. Sóller & Port de Sóller – Ride the vintage wooden train from Palma. Cap de Formentor – Breathtaking cliffs and scenic drive. Alcúdia Old Town – Beautifully preserved medieval town with markets. Cala d’Or / Cala Mondragó – Turquoise beaches and natural park.

item.title: Istanbul
item.description: Part 1: Must-Visit Places in Istanbul Istanbul’s treasures are split between the European and Asian sides, with most historical sites in the Sultanahmet (Old City) and Fatih districts. In the Historic Peninsula (Sultanahmet): Hagia Sophia (Ayasofya): A breathtaking architectural marvel that has been a church, a mosque, and now a museum/mosque again. Topkapi Palace: The vast palace of the Ottoman Sultans. Don’t miss the Harem and the Treasury. Blue Mosque (Sultanahmet Mosque): Famous for its stunning blue Iznik tiles and its six minarets.

item.title: Taipei
item.description: 🇹🇼 Must Visit in Taipei Cultural & Historical Chiang Kai-Shek Memorial Hall – majestic landmark with daily guard change. Longshan Temple – oldest temple in Taipei, rich with incense and tradition. National Palace Museum – one of the world’s best Chinese art collections. Modern & City Highlights Taipei 101 – iconic skyscraper, observation deck for panoramic views. Ximending – Taipei’s “Harajuku”; shopping, street art, youth culture. Huashan 1914 Creative Park – cafes, exhibitions, art markets.

item.title: Delhi
item.description: 🕌 Must Visit in Delhi 🌆 Historical & Cultural Landmarks Red Fort (Lal Qila) – Majestic Mughal architecture, evening light & sound show. Qutub Minar – UNESCO site and one of the world’s tallest brick minarets. Humayun’s Tomb – Inspiration for the Taj Mahal. India Gate & Rajpath – National monument with beautiful night lighting. Lotus Temple – Bahá’í House of Worship, serene and photogenic. Akshardham Temple – Impressive architecture and musical fountain show.

item.title: Kualalumpur
item.description: 🌆 Must-Visit Places in Kuala Lumpur Petronas Twin Towers – Iconic symbol of Malaysia; visit the Skybridge & Observation Deck for views. Batu Caves – Hindu temple inside limestone caves with a giant golden Murugan statue. KL Tower (Menara Kuala Lumpur) – Excellent city panorama, especially at sunset. Bukit Bintang – Shopping, dining, and nightlife hub. Merdeka Square & Sultan Abdul Samad Building – Historical heart of KL. Thean Hou Temple – Colorful Chinese temple with panoramic views.

item.title: Bangkok
item.description: 🌇 Must Visit in Bangkok Grand Palace & Wat Phra Kaew – iconic Thai royal architecture. Wat Arun (Temple of Dawn) – riverside temple best viewed at sunset. Wat Pho – giant reclining Buddha and traditional Thai massage school. Chatuchak Weekend Market – world’s largest weekend market. Jim Thompson House – traditional Thai teak house museum. Khao San Road – backpacker street with lively bars and street food. Asiatique The Riverfront – open-air night bazaar with Ferris wheel.

item.title: Singapore
item.description: 🌆 MUST VISIT IN SINGAPORE 🏙️ City Highlights Marina Bay Sands SkyPark – breathtaking skyline views Gardens by the Bay – Supertree Grove, Cloud Forest & Flower Dome Merlion Park – the iconic photo spot ArtScience Museum – futuristic interactive exhibits Singapore Flyer – observation wheel with panoramic views Clarke Quay – riverside nightlife & dining 🌿 Nature & Culture Singapore Botanic Gardens – UNESCO World Heritage Site Sentosa Island – beaches, Universal Studios, SEA Aquarium, SkyHelix
